channel.title: catia on Krishnakumar Chandran
channel.description: Recent content in catia on Krishnakumar Chandran

item.title: Design and Analysis of mechanical link for Tejas flight actuator
item.description:
Highlights

  • Contributed to component design in Autonomous flight control system
  • Focused on prediction of structural failure in aircraft structures
  • Designed structural component in CATIA and performed analysis in ANSYS

Problem Statement

  • Aim is to improve structural strength and address the issue of flight control actuator play

Ideation

Solution Methodology

Results and Conclusion

  • Published research work on " Conceptual Design and Analysis of Link for Arresting
  • Slat actuator Play in Tejas Aircraft " in an International Journal of Basic and Applied Engineering Research - Print ISSN: 2350-0077; Online ISSN: 2350-0255;
